page.title: 05CLACTON AIRFIELD
page.content: They have a Tiger Moth Navy Training plane with a max.speed of 139knots,it is worth about{Â£18,000}and was built in 1939.They own 5 aircraft altogether 2 planes which do pleasure flights{Â£5, three Cessna's, (Their newest planes) which are mainly used to give people flying lessons and also they have a new motorized glider so it does not need to be towed in the air. The Cessna F172 is there main plane,it has a small{RR}engine which gives it a cruising speed of about a 100 mph. It is steered by panels called { Ailerons}on the wings and{Elevators} on the tail plane,it is made of aliminium.There was a small airstrip in Alton Rd.In 1977 the people that own the airstrip now bought it after 18 years of it being there. In 1960 the long runway was lengthened to over 600 metres.
